verses.name: Acts 18:16
verses.text: And he drave them from the judgment seat.

verses.name: Acts 18:17
verses.text: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes, the chief ruler of the synagogue, and beat him before the judgment seat. And Gallio cared for none of those things.

verses.name: Acts 18:18
verses.text: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while, and then took his leave of the brethren, and sailed thence into Syria, and with him Priscilla and Aquila; having shorn his head in Cenchrea: for he had a vow.

verses.name: Acts 18:19
verses.text: And he came to Ephesus, and left them there: but he himself entered into the synagogue, and reasoned with the Jews.
